name: My Cute Anime Girlfriend
description:
My Cute Anime Girlfriend is a game where you get to live out your fantasies of having an actual anime girlfriend. She will never leave you and never betray you. She is always there for you. Take it upon yourself to play with her and make her as happy as she makes you. Let the love climax into one explosion of unforgettable emotions that will last forever. Score big with her and compare on the leader-boards as you may be able to get on top. Please leave a comment and tell us what you think :)

Tap repeatedly to fill the bar.
